actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit for Social Security taxes paid in 1980 and 1981.
short_title: Social Security Payroll Credit Act of 1979
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Payroll Credit Act of 1979 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers, employees, and self-employed individuals an income tax credit equal to 20 percent of the amount of social security taxes paid by such individuals in 1980 and 1981.

titles.title: Social Security Payroll Credit Act of 1979
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an income tax credit for Social Security taxes paid in 1980 and 1981.
